value.name: Activists Demand Answers After Black Baby Killed in Shootout
value.description: Officials have not yet said who is responsible for the shot that killed a 3-month-old baby when his father died in a shootout with police on a highway last week in Mississippi. Activists with Black Lives Matter Mississippi are calling for the release of police body camera footage of what happened May 3 near Biloxi.
